TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

summary.span: 表示 安全令牌的一个声明，它断言已做出与该主题访问指定资源有关的授权决定。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定主题是否有权访问特定的资源。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 断言已做出了有关主题访问指定资源的授权决定。An asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made. 下表概括了与该授权决定关联的属性。The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||由 SAML 授权机构做出的、与 属性所表示的资源有关的授权决定。The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the property.| ||SAML 授权机构做出该决定时所依赖的一组 SAML 断言。A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.| ||一个 URI 引用，它标识要试图访问的资源。A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.| ||该主题有权对 属性所表示的资源执行的操作集。The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the property.|

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
